articles.title: Park Chan-Wook to Preside Over 79th Cannes Film Festival Jury - Variety
articles.description: Park Chan-wook will succeed French actor Juliette Binoche as president of the Cannes Film Festival jury.

articles.title: Adult Swim’s ‘Smiling Friends’ to End After Season 3 - Variety
articles.description: Adult Swim's animated comedy 'Smiling Friends' is ending after its third season.

articles.title: Protestors Gather at ‘Scream 7’ Premiere After Melissa Barrera Fired: ‘Stand For Free Speech’ and ‘Cancel Paramount+’ - Variety
articles.description: Protestors gathered outside of Wednesday night's 'Scream 7' premiere, calling for a boycott of the horror film in a show of support for Palestine.

articles.title: Son of ‘Real Housewives of Salt Lake City’ star Mary Cosby dies at 23 - The Salt Lake Tribune
articles.description: Robert Cosby Jr., the son of "Real Housewives of Salt Lake City" star Mary Cosby, has died at 23. His candid struggles with substance misuse were highlighted on the Utah reality show.

articles.description: "Industry" has been renewed for Season 5 at HBO, which will be the show's final season.

articles.title: Robert Carradine, Lizzie McGuire Star, Dead at 71 - Vulture
articles.description: Robert Carradine, who played Sam McGuire in Lizzie McGuire and Lewis in Revenge of the Nerds, has died at the age of 71. He has been remembered in tributes by his Disney Channel cast.
